inputs.name: Input/output options
inputs.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

input.name: Input
input.description: Path to comma-separated file containing information about the samples in the experiment.

outdir.name: Outdir
outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

multiqc_title.name: Multiqc Title
multiqc_title.description: MultiQC report title. Printed as page header, used for filename if not otherwise specified.

inputs.name: Reference genome options
inputs.description: Reference genome related files and options required for the workflow.

igenomes_base.name: Igenomes Base
igenomes_base.description: Directory / URL base for iGenomes references.

bwt2_index.name: Bwt2 Index
bwt2_index.description: Full path to directory containing Bowtie index including base name. i.e. `/path/to/index/base`.

inputs.name: Digestion Hi-C
inputs.description: Parameters for protocols based on restriction enzyme

digestion.name: Digestion
digestion.description: Name of restriction enzyme to automatically set the restriction_site and ligation_site options (hindiii, mboi, dpnii, arima)

restriction_site.name: Restriction Site
restriction_site.description: Restriction motifs used during digestion. Several motifs (comma separated) can be provided.

ligation_site.name: Ligation Site
ligation_site.description: Expected motif after DNA ligation.  Several motifs (comma separated) can be provided.

chromosome_size.name: Chromosome Size
chromosome_size.description: Full path to file specifying chromosome sizes (tab separated with chromosome name and size)`.

restriction_fragments.name: Restriction Fragments
restriction_fragments.description: Full path to restriction fragment (bed) file.

save_reference.name: Save Reference
save_reference.description: If generated by the pipeline save the annotation and indexes in the results directory.

inputs.name: DNAse Hi-C
inputs.description: Parameters for protocols based on DNAse digestion

dnase.name: Dnase
dnase.description: For Hi-C protocols which are not based on enzyme digestion such as DNase Hi-C

min_cis_dist.name: Min Cis Dist
min_cis_dist.description: Minimum distance between loci to consider. Useful for --dnase mode to remove spurious ligation products. Only values > 0 are considered

split_fastq.name: Split Fastq
split_fastq.description: Split the reads into chunks before running the pipelne

fastq_chunks_size.name: Fastq Chunks Size
fastq_chunks_size.description: Read number per chunks if split_fastq is used

min_mapq.name: Min Mapq
min_mapq.description: Keep aligned reads with a minimum quality value

bwt2_opts_end2end.name: Bwt2 Opts End2End
bwt2_opts_end2end.description: Option for HiC-Pro end-to-end bowtie mapping

bwt2_opts_trimmed.name: Bwt2 Opts Trimmed
bwt2_opts_trimmed.description: Option for HiC-Pro trimmed reads mapping

save_aligned_intermediates.name: Save Aligned Intermediates
save_aligned_intermediates.description: Save all BAM files during two-steps mapping

max_insert_size.name: Max Insert Size
max_insert_size.description: Maximum fragment size to consider. Only values > 0 are considered

min_insert_size.name: Min Insert Size
min_insert_size.description: Minimum fragment size to consider. Only values > 0 are considered

max_restriction_fragment_size.name: Max Restriction Fragment Size
max_restriction_fragment_size.description: Maximum restriction fragment size to consider. Only values > 0 are considered

min_restriction_fragment_size.name: Min Restriction Fragment Size
min_restriction_fragment_size.description: Minimum restriction fragment size to consider. Only values > 0 are considered

save_interaction_bam.name: Save Interaction Bam
save_interaction_bam.description: Save a BAM file where all reads are flagged by their interaction classes

save_pairs_intermediates.name: Save Pairs Intermediates
save_pairs_intermediates.description: Save all types of non valid read pairs in distinct output files

inputs.name: Contact maps
inputs.description: Options to build Hi-C contact maps

bin_size.name: Bin Size
bin_size.description: Resolution to build the maps (comma separated)

hicpro_maps.name: Hicpro Maps
hicpro_maps.description: Generate raw and normalized contact maps with HiC-Pro

ice_filter_low_count_perc.name: Ice Filter Low Count Perc
ice_filter_low_count_perc.description: Filter low counts rows before HiC-Pro normalization

ice_filter_high_count_perc.name: Ice Filter High Count Perc
ice_filter_high_count_perc.description: Filter high counts rows before HiC-Pro normalization

ice_max_iter.name: Ice Max Iter
ice_max_iter.description: Maximum number of iteraction for HiC-Pro ICE normalization

res_zoomify.name: Res Zoomify
res_zoomify.description: Maximum resolution to build mcool file

inputs.name: Downstream Analysis
inputs.description: Set up downstream analysis from contact maps

res_tads.name: Res Tads
res_tads.description: Resolution to run TADs callers (comma separated)

inputs.name: Skip options
inputs.description: Skip some steps of the pipeline

skip_balancing.name: Skip Balancing
skip_balancing.description: Do not run cooler balancing normalization

skip_mcool.name: Skip Mcool
skip_mcool.description: Do not generate mcool file for Higlass visualization

inputs.name: Institutional config options
inputs.description: Parameters used to describe centralised config profiles. These should not be edited.

custom_config_version.name: Custom Config Version
custom_config_version.description: Git commit id for Institutional configs.

inputs.name: Max job request options
inputs.description: Set the top limit for requested resources for any single job.

max_cpus.name: Max Cpus
max_cpus.description: Maximum number of CPUs that can be requested for any single job.

max_memory.name: Max Memory
max_memory.description: Maximum amount of memory that can be requested for any single job.

max_time.name: Max Time
max_time.description: Maximum amount of time that can be requested for any single job.

inputs.name: Generic options
inputs.description: Less common options for the pipeline, typically set in a config file.

max_multiqc_email_size.name: Max Multiqc Email Size
max_multiqc_email_size.description: File size limit when attaching MultiQC reports to summary emails.

multiqc_methods_description.name: Multiqc Methods Description
multiqc_methods_description.description: Custom MultiQC yaml file containing HTML including a methods description.

tracedir.name: Tracedir
tracedir.description: Directory to keep pipeline Nextflow logs and reports.

validate_params.name: Validate Params
validate_params.description: Boolean whether to validate parameters against the schema at runtime
